description_for_human: Real-time cryptocurrency market data for 10,000+ coins and 200+ DeFi protocols. Track prices, analyze markets, and manage portfolios.
description_for_model: Crypto Data Aggregator provides comprehensive cryptocurrency market data via REST API. Use this to get real-time prices, market caps, trading volumes, historical data, DeFi protocol TVL, trending coins, and market sentiment. Supports x402 payment protocol for premium access. All endpoints return JSON. Key endpoints: /api/market/coins for listings, /api/market/snapshot/{coinId} for details, /api/market/history/{coinId} for historical data, /api/defi/protocols for DeFi rankings, /api/trending for trending coins, /api/sentiment for Fear & Greed Index.
